name: Some Robot Game
description:
A game where you fight endless giant robots until you die.

This game is still a prototype and contains bugs.

Feedbacks are VERY much appreciated.

Idea is based on a randomly generated sentence:

Controls:

A/D/Left/Right: Move

W/Space/Up: Jump

Left Mouse Button: Attack

Right Mouse Button: Snap

Credits:

BGM: 

Chipped Urgency (Combat) by Centurion_of_war [Source]

Sound Effects:

Duck quacking by dobroide [Source]

Screw popping by Mark DiAngelo [Source]
